Summary: a light came from the sky and left
trends: There have been 10 other sightings in Vacaville
There were no other sightings in Vacaville on or around February 15th 2006
divs: Sighting Detailsthis bright as hell light came from the sky, and it was like a tube, like a cylinder, it came down slowly and it touched the roof of this gas station and all the lights in and around the gas station went out, even the car we were in was on and the car just shut off, we were on a hill like 15 ft from the station, i noticed it as i was pointing at the station tellin anthony to get me a soda, at first i thought i had lost to much sleep then i relalized i wasnt tired, then all of a sudden it left like, it instantly was gone and all the lights and the car started again, and the car didnt start as in like u turn the key and it starts slowly, it was like a paused movie
